mun nyi ni/ a brta/ bi brta/ kha brte/ pra ma ar+tha/ dz+yo ti ra brta swA hA/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po rgyug cing glu'-i dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang /

de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin du dga' ste/ yid rab tu dga' nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khams rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas bskyed pa dang / /zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis nye bar bstan/ /

mchog sbyin dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/ /

yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin du dar la bab pa/ byad bzhin bzang ba btsun pa'i cha byad 'chang ba lnga bcu

glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge sbyong glu long shig /dge sbyong gar byos shig /

rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par bya yis nyon cig /de dag gis gcom bskyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /dngos po thams

cad mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin/ /'dus byas g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med/ /smig rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin de la ther zug med/ /chos kun myur du 'jig par blo dang ldan pas shes/ /sdug bsngal chos gzir byas pa thams

cad gar chags pa/ /reg kun sdug bsngal khur yin tshor ba dag kyang med/ /ji ltar dad pa byang chub lam bsgom bsten byed pa/ /de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med/ /chos kun mtshan nyid gcig ste 'du shes spangs

pa dge/ /bdag med ldan pas spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag /srog dang gso ba gang zag dang ni byed pa med/ /bdud kyi g.yo dag thong la sems ni byang chub bsngos/ /nam mkha'i glog bzhin dbang po dag la rnam shes 'byung / /

reg dang tshor dang sems pa thams cad bdag med de/ /tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yang yod ma yin/ /byis pa'i sde rnams bslus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug /phung por thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med/ /yang dag

mtha' ni stong zhing mtha' rnams kun dang bral/ /byang chub lam spyod des ni 'dren pas byang chub brnyes/ /rmongs med chos nyid 'di ni chos su skyob pas gsungs/ /'di lta ste/ su mun de/ bi mun de/ sun da dza ti/ si li si li si li/

a ba si li/ a ba ha si li/ ta thA tA si li/ b+hu ta ko Ti si li swAhA/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag

shin du dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song 'di 'dra'i chos ma thos/ /gti mug mi shes dngos pos sdig las ci bgyis pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras la bdag cag mngon sum deng bshags na/ /

'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs/ /bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/ /

yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang de dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang ste/ srang de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug /maud gal gyi bu chen po ni nub phyogs su bltas te 'dug /gang po ni

lho phyogs su bltas te 'dug /rab 'byor ni shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas gcig nas gcig tu dpag tshad phyed phyed tsam na 'khod do/ /nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag gi dbus kyi sa'i phyogs na khru lnga bcus 'khor ba'i pad ma chu ba ni 'dzam bu'i

chu bo'i gser/ 'dab ma ni bai dUr+ya sngon po/ /ze ba ni dpal gyi snying po/ /snying po ni mu tig /dri ni lha'i spos las lhag pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa zhig byung ste/ pad mo de las snang ba byung ngo / /snang ba des stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/ srang de na pad ma de 'phang du mi gsum gyi khrun tsam du snang ngo / /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du ni pad ma de'i 'phang du lta'i dpag tshad lnga bcu par snang ngo / /sum bcu rtsa gsum

pa'i lha'i nang du ni pad ma de'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya par snang ngo / /'og min gyi lha'i bar du ni pad ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad phyed par snang ngo / /pad+ma de'i 'dab ma dag las tshig dang don dang tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sems can gang dag sa 'di la

gnas pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir gang zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa/ /gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu

bskor/ /nyag cig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byon pa the tshom med/ /mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang rig pa chos don mthar 'dod pa/ /tshul shes pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dir ston pas btul/ /'gro ba kun la phan don rig mkhas dam

chos gsung ba che/ /thub pa smra mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pas de ring gshegs/ /dus gsum gshegs pa ston pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang / /tshad med chos don rig pa mi dang lhar bcas 'gro ba skyob/ /'jig rten don dang phan

spyod mkhas pa ye shes chen po'i sgron/ /dam pa gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs de ring 'dir kun ston/ /sdug bsngal phongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing / /'jig rten don slad mi bsnyel blo gros mnga' bas spyad/ /ma rig pa yis bsgribs

pa'i mig can dag la yang / /dam pa'i chos kyis mig ni ji bzhin rab tu sbyin/ /thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'dir ni tshogs 'gyur gyis/ /don gyi dam pa gzigs pa gzugs bzang mchog mnga' la/ /stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog

ma yin mkhyen pa/ /smra ba'i seng ge ring por mi thogs 'dir gshegs so/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas pa gzigs nas ni/ /dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing / /mngon par shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang

ba/ /de ni chos kyi rnga chen brdung du yang dag gshegs/ /dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa/ /don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo bsgyur dbang po/ /pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyir/ /drug gi

sa bon smra ba'i seng ge 'dir gshegs so/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad ma de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /khyed cag tshogs te de ring dga' ba spyod/ /bag med sems pa srid dang rgyags pas bsgribs/ /

rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos/ /bag med gyur pas bde gshegs mchod mi byed/ /'dod pa mi rtag chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin du sra/ /dga' ba dag la bag med ma thar ba/ /nam yang mya ngan

'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bag med zhi ba'i phyir mi 'jug /dge dang mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam/ /rga dang na 'chi'i 'jigs pas kun zin cing / /khyed cag ngan song sa la rab tu zhugs/ /sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la/

sten cig sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang bsrung / /'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spongs la/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar dong / /song ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyon/ /legs bshad de ni khyod kyi don chen te/ /shes

rab rnams grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu/ /dam pa'i chos ldan mnyan pa don chen no/ /lha yi ris bcu drug gi bar du pad ma de'i 'dab ma las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo / /mnyam bzhag bsam tan dga' ba nyon mongs med/ /

rab tu bsgrim te chos la rnam par bsgoms/ /ma 'khrul sems dang rnam par thar 'dod pas/ /zhe sdang rab tu spangs pa'i blo gyis shig /rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bstan pa yi/ /bzod pa mchog la rnams par bsgom par gyis/ /

des ni na dang rga las thar ba yi/ /shin du rnam thar myur du thob par 'gyur/ /gang rnams gzugs kyi rnam rtog srog la chags/ /ther zug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por lta/ /de dag gi ni skye ba'i rgyun mi 'chad/ /de rnams ngan song sa la shin du

'bab/ /rtag tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing / /byed med rang dbang med par rnam par bltas nas/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa/ /de dag 'gro ba kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /skye dang 'jig grol chos 'di thams cad

la/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams sgom byed pa/ /de dag 'chi med rga med na ba'ang med/ /ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad pa'ang med/ /gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags/ /lam de mchog ste shin tu dag pa yin/ /

da ltar shAkya seng ge 'di bzhin du/ /bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par 'joms par 'gyur/ /gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spang phyir/ /ci yang med cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa/ /tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa rnams/ /de dag

la ni lam mchog 'di bshad do/ /bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur par/ /chos 'di thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su/ /smon pa spangs na bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg par 'gyur/ /de lta bu'i don gyi tshig gis

chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs te/ srang gi dbus na pad ma de 'khor bar 'dug go/ /'og min gyi lha grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir

pad ma de'i 'khor yug tu 'khod do/ /bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas kun du bltas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang gi dbus na pad ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag byung ste/ chos

mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad ma de 'khor bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du bltas na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi gnas thams cad na yang chos mnyan pa'i

phyir lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad ma de 'khor bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la bcags te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing / lus rngul te

lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen po bos te bdud gzhan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mi 'gyur yid kyis nga yi tshig nyon la/ /nga la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med/ /thub stobs yon tan shin du dri

med de/ /skye bo brtan phyir 'jig rten 'dir 'dug go/ /lha mi dga' ba'i dam pa 'dir byung ste/ /'gro mchog ma lus nges par nye bar dong / /bde gshegs tshig la skom zhing rab tu dga'/ /yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i lam du 'gro/ /

'di ni 'jig rten gsum po slu ba dge sbyong sgyu yin te/ /lha mi mang po thams cad yid gcig pad ma 'khor bar 'dug /da ni 'jigs pa'i skad phyung myur du ri yi char phob ste/ /ci nas bdud kyi sde btsan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dir

brlag gyis/ /de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gi phan byed tshig 'di nyon cig khyod kyi chos rig na/ /bdag sde brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro/ /bde gshegs gzi brjid

sku dang dpal 'chang gzugs mthong bdag cag myos/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skyabs rab mchog gzhan med/ /de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu ngu zhing gdong mchog tu khro bas non pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras

so/ /log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa/ /bdag gi stobs mthu med pa 'ang mi shes sam/ /'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod sdo ba/ /ngo mi tsha 'am 'dzem par mi bya 'am/ /bdag cag stobs ni shin du brlag par 'gyur/ /

sangs rgyas mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /pad ma'i drung du nye bar der 'dong ste/ /chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shin du dag /bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag gyur te/ /lus ni dri nga stobs dang brtson 'grus stor/ /ci tsam

skad cig brlag par ma gyur pa/ /de yi bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dong / /de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can khyod ni chos kyi spyod pa spangs shing sdig byed dga'/ /sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i

phan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog /grong khyer 'dir byon bdag cag myur du dga' zhing dang bas blta/ /'jig rten gsum mchod srogs chags kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'dong / /de nas nam mkha' de nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo

gros shes bya ba des sgra chen por 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed kun tshogs pas gus shing dga' ldan nga yi tshig nyon cig /sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btud ngag yid 'thun spyod de/ /khro spangs rab dga' thub pa'i gsung

mchog la yang dga' dad bskyed/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs dong de ring gus par mchod/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las

byas te/ bdud la la ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do/ /la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni dbang byed kyi cha byad du/ la la ni dbang phyug

chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byad

du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'phags skyes po'i cha byad du/ la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byad du/ la la ni yul 'khor bsrung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni nyi ma'i cha byad du/

la la ni zla ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni skar ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni nam mkha' lding gi cha byad du/ la la ni mi 'am ci'i cha byad du/ la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i cha byad du/

la la ni gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni nor bu rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byad du/ la la ni 'khor lo

rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni nor bu rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni glang po rin po che sa bsrung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi cha byad du/ la la ni bud med rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/

la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/ /la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sngo la phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das

la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'phang du ta la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do/ /la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la phyang 'phrul dang / spud pa kha dog leb rgan te

gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ser po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do/ /la la ni leb rgan kha dog leb rgan la gser gyi gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang / lhab lhub ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'thing ga thogs shing

'khod do/ /la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la mu tig dmar po'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char

mngon par 'bebaso/ /la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so/ /la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo / /la la ni lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin

po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te sa la chags chag 'debs so/ /la la ni mching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par byed do/ /la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin to/ /la la ni kha dog sna

tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do/ /bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir

rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs so/ /la la ni srang dang / khang pa dang / khyim dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo dang / shing dang / gzhal med khang rnams

na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ rab tu 'khrugs te

skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag la phyin chad grogs med de/ /bdag gi dpal deng thams cad stor/ /bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams/ /brtson 'grus tha ma brtsam par bya/ /bdag gis pad ma rtsa ba bcad/ /

pad ma bcad dang kun 'khrugs te/ /des na sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro/ /de ni tha ma'i stobs yin no/ /bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsams nas rlung lta bur nam mkha' las babs te/ srang gi pad ma ga la ba der phyin nas pad ma de'i sdong po

yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na reg par yang ma nus/ pad ma'i 'dab ma bcad par 'dod na de dag kyang ma mthong / pad ma'i snying po lag pas brdab par 'dod na de yang ma dmigs te/ dper na glog snang yang mi dmigs pa bzhin no/ /'di lta ste dper na grib

ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pad mo de yang snang mod kyi mi dmigs so/ /gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing rig par mi rung ba de'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad rab tu dngas par bya ba'i phyir skad drag cing che la 'jigs

pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod na de yang ma nus so/ /yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te rab tu bskyod par 'dod na reg par yang ma nus te ma dmigs so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na la la zhig nam mkha' la

rdob par 'dod na mi dmigs pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung zhing ma dmigs nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas sems can 'dus pa rnams brtags te sems rnam par 'khrugs par bya'o snyam na sems can

de dag mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par yang ma nus so/ /de nas bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'dar te/ gdong mchi ma can gyis phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge sbyong

gis ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'di byas/ /'di ltar bdag ni mdun 'dir slad bzhin skad cig myos par song / /yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog kyang zad/ /des bskrad brlag par ma gyur bar du bdag gnas myur du 'gro/ /

bdag gi gnas su 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma nus te/ /rab tu skrag cing ngus nas 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong / dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog

zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/ ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi pha rol tu 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam na/ 'on kyang

mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'bros kyang ma nus te/ de nyid du mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis mthong nas rab tu khros shing skrag ste/ skad chen por ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /kyi hud bu dang

gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo zhes zer ro/ /de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur te/ des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci phyir khyod deng mya ngan

yid kyis ngu gdong sgra chen 'bod/ /'gro ba kun gtso thub mchog skyabs su ma 'jigs myur du song / /'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sel ba/ /'di la bsnyen bkur zhi 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur

yang dag /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gi tshig snyan pas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su song la/ bcings pa 'di las bdag grol bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsams te/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das

bzhugs pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag

skyabs su mchi'o/ /'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /thub mchog myur du 'jigs chen mi bzad bcing pa 'di las khrol/ /de ring slan chad bde gshegs gtso bo mchog skyabs bdag mchis te/ /gti mug gis ni bdag ldongs

khyod la khros shing nongs chen gyis/ /mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyi/ /gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis tshig snyan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ba de'i tshe na bdag grol ba snyam du shes so/

yang gang gi tshe 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'i tshe yang mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis shes te/ gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro bar ma nus pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang / skyabs su sems bskyed nas yang

bdag nyid grol bar shes so/ /lan bdun gyi bar du bdag bcings pa dang grol bar shes te de nyid du 'dug go/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// //
bam po bzhi pa/ gong du smos pa'i bar du ste/ nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba bdud gzhon nu

de dag gis dge sbyong glu long shig /dge sbyong gar byos shig ces spyod pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis gang gi tshe

tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi

bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /chos kyi kha lo bsgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang / /rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur te/ /nyan thos de dag la ni rgyal ka deng byas pa/ /

'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur/ /de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdong mchi ma can gyis

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /da ltar bstan pa 'di yi gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te/ /bstan pa'i cho ga bsrung slad du/

kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga nyid der song ste/ /bzhon dpung bcas pa'i bdud btul la/ /skye bo mang po thams cad kyang / /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya/ /de nas bdud de dag
thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ bdud kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/

klu'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal tam/ yul thams cad kyi nang na ni sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags

te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa dang / lta ba'i rgyal mo dral ba dang /

sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi/ 'on kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa'i mi rigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi khams na sems can

ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud du gyur la/ de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te de dag thams cad nga la bsad par shom yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang gnod par mi

nus so/ /ngas 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang / gdul bar nus te/ bdud g.yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtogs so/ /yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer

chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan pas/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste yongs su spyod do/ /de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas/ bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam na gdan las gzhengs par bzhed pa dang / de nas 'od ma'i tshal bsrung ba'i lha mo mthu mdzes shes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma

can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ /grong khyer 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis bltam/ /re re la yang shin tu ma rungs pa/ /bye bas smra ba'i seng ge bskor cing mchis/ /zhe sdang

rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te/ /khyod dgrongs slad du 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis gnas/ /mgon po rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs/ /'jig rten rtsa lag brlag par ma bzhud cig /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan las

bzhengs pa de'i tshe/ gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sdig can dag ni lnga stong po/ /mtshon char bcas pa mchis pa ni/ /

btsam med de dag khyod la sdod/ /thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas byung ba de'i tshe/ sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros shes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal

nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten sgron ma brlag gyur na/ /kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing / /chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig /chos kyi gru yang 'jig par 'gyur/ 'jig rten kun na rgya chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur/ /

'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs g.yo can gdug pas shin du bltam/ /sa 'di bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rung 'gyur ba las/ /ji ltar shin du 'byung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis/ /khyod brlag bgyi slad 'di na rab tu mi bzad mang

po dag /sdig pa'i chos can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten bsrung slad bdag gi tshig gson te/ /stobs bcu grub par bzhud de de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig /

de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang / de na shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya ba de snying rje snying brtse bar ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams

cad don grub thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur na ni/ /mgon po khams gsum 'di dag thams cad de'u re mig ni stor bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'di la sbrul gyi rked chings rno ba'i mda' dang mtshon thogs shing / /khyod dgrongs slad du

kha nas me 'bar rgyu yis da ni der ma gshegs/ /de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /grong khyer bzang po

'di na bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po/ /mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par blta/ /gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams/ /khyod dgrongs slad du 'di na

mchis kyis gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du byon pa dang / der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer bsrung ba'i lha mo ta ma la'i snying po zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra cher ngu zhing

bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings por song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan shul 'di seng ge rnga mo glang chen smyon pas bskor/ /dge slong rnams
la gtse slad bdud kyi rnam mang gnod par bgyid/ /sa 'dir ston pa khyod dgrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson/ /sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse'i slad du ma gshegs shig /bcom ldan bdud

btul khyod kyis bstan pa rnam zhig dang / /sgyu ma bgyis pa mi mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas/ /lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams/ /kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin du rnam par 'khrugs/ /dam chos cher zhig pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs

gyur dang / /nam mkha' skar ma'i 'od stor nyi zla gyur mthong nas/ /'gro mchog kye ma mi bzad klad pa deng drag rdob/ /bde gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi hud mchi/ /mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di nyams shing / /chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur/ /

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs pas brlag /chos kyi chu yang skam par 'gyur/ /dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du/ /ma rung 'gyur ba nyer gnas tshe/ /mi dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang / /'di dag tu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas lha mo

des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol/ /smra mchog de ring brlag par ma bzhud cig /bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod gyur na/ /

'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi/ /'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog /bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud/ /sems can thugs brtse'i slad du 'dir bzhes te/ /sems can skye bas gtses pa

'jigs thar mdzod/ /dam pa brnyes nas sgrol bar rab 'gyur bar/ /sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs/ /sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs/ /srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung shig /

sku mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs/ /kye ma 'dod la chags pa'i byis pa'i sde/ /de rnams zhi bgyid slad du chos lam shod/ /skye mched dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong / /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang /

de nas sa'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig skra gshig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni/ /rgya mtsho bzhin

bltam pa yi khrag bstsal cing / /dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam/ /spyan yang gang gA'i bye ma rnyed bstsal to/ /sngon ni rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta/ /gnas dang gos dang mal

cha zas skom dang / /de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman bstsal/ /rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa mdzad/ /khyod kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs/ /bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bsnyen/ /phar 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no/ /

bya ba dka' ba dag kyang mtha' yas spyad/ /sems can du ma nyon mongs thar bar mdzad/ /gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni/ /lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig /chu bo chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral/ /

'jig rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te/ /sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bsal bar bya/ /sems can mang po 'jigs med grong khyer gzud/ /sems can de dag dgos pa yongs rdzogs shing / /byang chub dam pa la ni shin du khod/ /'di na

lam bor sdig pa spyod pa rnams/ /tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod par mdzod/ /'di dag sgrol tshig dam bcas dgongs su gsol/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por chos ston to/ /mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol/ /'di dag

yan lag brgyad kyis chu yis khrus/ /mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis/ /bdag grol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzad/ /srid gsum rgya mtsho las kyang 'gro ba sgrol/ /

khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig /rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang nas gshegs pa dang / skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang

po nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bde gshegs sngon mthong ba/ /zhi ba'i dus la shin du slob ma dul/ /chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na/ /de la de lta bu'i

bgegs ma byung / /ston pa 'di ni shin du dus ngan la/ /rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyes te/ /thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad slad du/ /'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing / /smra ba'i seng ge 'di na bzhugs bzhin du/ /

sdig can dag ni bye ba stong mang po/ /de ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par bgyid/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo grong du deng ma gshegs/ /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa/ /

de dag yul cig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa/ /'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor/ /de ring ma rung bar ni gyur ta re/ /de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slad/ /shin du sems

can don mdzad spyad/ /de ni de ring grong khyer 'dir/ /brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go/ /yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

gdong la mchi ma zag cing ngom zung gnag pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/ la la ni skra 'bal/ la la ni rgyan 'grol/ la la ni gdugs dang rgyal

mtshan dang ba dan snyol/ la la ni bdag nyid kyi lus sa la rdob/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/ la la ni shin du nyon mongs par ngu la la ni lag pas brang rdung / la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so bya bzhin

du 'gre ldog /la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bstod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang / gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang gser gyi skud pa dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang ras

bcos bu dag mngon par 'thor ro/ /de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang pos mgrin gcig tu skad mthon por 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten don slad 'di bas mang ba yi/ /bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu spyad/ /zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod skyes

kyis/ /btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugs su gsol/ /sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung ngu mdzad/ /lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin du nyung / /shin du yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs la/ /

srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol/ /dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smin te/ /bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can du ma la/ /khyod kyi thugs rje bskyed de so sor rab ston la/ /chu bo las ni 'jig rten

nyam thag bsgral bar mdzod/ /'gro ba dgon pa'i dbus song 'khyams gyur cing / /'khor ba'i dgon par shin du lam stor ba/ /de dag la ni lam mchog so sor ston/ /'phags pa'i chos mchog tshig gis thar bar mdzod/ /

chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa gang bskor ba/ /de ni khyod kyi thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad/ /rlabs chen thugs mnga' ring du bzhugs su gsol/ /'gro ba rnams ni mgon med ma gyur cig /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

rnam 'dren brgya la ma rung gyur na ni/ /'jig rten 'di ltar ma lus ldongs par 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad lam rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu/ /'dir ni yong ye thams cad ma mchis 'gyur/ /bdag lus sems las skyes dge sa bon

dag /bdag cag bag yod gyur pas 'dir btab ste/ /de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan/ /bsod nams 'byung gnas 'dir brlag ma gyur cig /yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus par

gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lhags kyang / /thub pa rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni/ /ma rung mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig /dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon sum gyur/ /

dpag tshad sum bcu drug tu mgyogs shing drag shul ldan pas kun tu bskor/ /sna bgrang ral gri mtshon rnon rtsub pa'i sgra mang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde/ /byang chub snying por lhags pa de dag 'jigs shing brlag gyur na/ /da ltar don brnyes

grags pas khyab pa de la ga la bgegs shig byed/ /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mi che/ /'di ni bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi sde ste shin du dpung che bas/ /'jig rten

rnam par 'dren pa 'di ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dogs/ /de brlag na ni 'jig rten 'di dag shin du snang med 'khyam par 'ong / /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus

nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gson te/ /dge ba bzhugs shing gtso bo thugs rje can/ /lha mang bye ba mya ngan chen pos gdungs/ /de la chos kyi bcud kyis da gtor cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ de dag shin du dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /deng khyed ma 'jigs khyed ni ma skrag shig /bdud rnams

thams cad bzhon bcas gcig char du/ /tshogs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nus na/ /nga yi lus kun la ni smos ci dgos/ /deng ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste/ /nga yis rtag tu sa 'dir chos bshad do/ /lam rnams stor

ba la ni nga nyid kyis/ /dri ma med pa yang dag lam bstan bya/ /ngas sngon bya ba dka' ba mang po byas/ /zas dang skom yang shin du rgya cher byin/ /gnas dang sman yang mi nyung sbyin byin pas/ /nga la deng su gnod par byed par nus/ /ngas ni rta dang

glang chen shing rta dang / /lhab lhub phyang 'phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang / /bran pho bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang / /nga la su zhig gnod par byed par nus/ /chung ma bu pho bu mo bran mang dang / /yid 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal po'i rigs/ /

sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byin rlob/ /nga lus de ring ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur/ /mgo dang sna dang rna ba mig gnyis dang / /lus dang pags pa khrag dang rkang lag bcas/ /nga yi srog kyang lus can rnams la btang / /

su zhig nga la 'tshe bar byed par nus/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas bye ba rab mang la/ /gus ldan bdag gi lag nas shin du mchod/ /rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang bzod la dga'/ /nga la su zhig brlag par byed par nus/ /ngas sngon shin

du bya dka' mang po rnams/ /mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu nga yis byas/ /lus kun bcad kyang nga la 'khrug med na/ /nga la rnam par 'tshe ba su zhig nus/ /nyon mongs ngas brtul nges par nga sangs rgyas/ /sems can

thams cad la ni byams sems ldan/ /khro med phrag dog tha ba nga la med/ /nga yi mdun na de ring su zhig nus/ /ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul/ /ngas ni bdud mang bye ba pham par byas/ /khyed kun rnam par thar par nges

par bya/ /grong du ci phyir mi 'gro ma 'jigs shig /sems can don phyir phyogs bcu 'di dag na/ /sangs rgyas la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' yang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po
rnams ni kun na bsogs/ /zhing rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya/ /bsod nams ye shes dag gis gnas par bya/ /sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas kun gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas dag gi dgongs pa'i mdzad

pa bya/ /yang de'i tshe lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so

zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das la phyag 'tshalo phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbyugs phyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pham par mdzad do/ /sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs

pa'i rnyog pa bsal to/ /sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil to/ /skye ba'i shing ljon pa bcad do/ /'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlags so/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal to/ /gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad par bsgyur to/ /chu bo

bzhi skams so/ /chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do/ /byang chub kyi lam ston to/ /bzod pa dang des pa la btsud do/ /bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par mdzad do/ /ston pa

bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to/ /sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu btsud do/ /de nas lha dang mi de dag gis bdug pa dang / me tog dang /

spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag dar byas so/ /lha'i gos dang / me tog dang / lha'i ras bcos bus kun du

g.yogs so/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / pu ru sha ka chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad mas kun tu

g.yogs so/ /gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos gnyis su lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te/ lha'i ras bcos bu dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang lag rgyan dang rna rgyan dang / mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan

to/ /shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhim pa'i chu dang zhing rnyog pa med la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun du gang ba kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi brgyan pa dag sprul te/ bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang /

rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba bzung zhing gser gyi phye ma dag gi char yang phab bo/ /dngul dang bai dUr+ya'i phye ma dang / a ga ru dang rgya spos dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i char

rab tu phab bo/ /go sh-ir sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang lam der phab bo/ /lha'i rgyan sna tshogs gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad

brgyan to/ /grong ngam/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na yang lha dang mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do/ /grong khyer gyi nang na bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir

bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam du gshegs so/ /yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku'i

gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/ de na sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs par

mthong ba nas/ gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang / gang dag sred med kyi bus 'dul ba dang / gang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag 'khor los

sgyur bas 'dul ba dang / gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang / gang dag gzhon nus 'dul ba dang / gang dag bud med kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag

seng ges 'dul ba dang / gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang / gang dag klus 'dul ba dang / gang dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul ba nas/ gang dag ri bong la dad cing ri bong gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang

rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ngo / /sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par

mthong ste/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/ zhabs 'bring du 'brang zhing dong ngo / /yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri dang nye ba na gnas pa drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas/

de g.yog lnga brgya dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo'i drung na sdod pas bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / bkod pa de lta bus lam nas gshegs shing lha bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong mang po mchod pa byed par brtson par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so/ /bden par 'di ni drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ lha dang mis mchod par snang ngo / /'di'i lus thams cad kyang

bsod nams kyis mtshan gyis brgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so/ /bdag cag gnyis gang rgan/ gang mkhas pa de la ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste/ de nas yang 'di ltar bdag gis mdun bsu la/ 'di la rigs

dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun dri'o snyam du sems so/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /thos ldan yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang / /

ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhyen/ /khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor/ /yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad mnyan/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u

de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te

'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khyed su zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni bram ze'o/ /gsol pa/ gdung rus ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i rus ni gau ta ma'o/ /gsol pa/ khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/ bka' stsal pa/

nga'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo/ /gsol pa/ khyod kyi spyod pa ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid la spyod do/ /gsol pa/ khyod rab tu byung nas ji srid lon/ bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa byung nas

ji srid lon pa nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no/ /gsol pa/ drang srong chen po skar ma bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rig pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid du'o 'di ni 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste/

de la snying po ci zhig yod/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gnas gang yin/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ gang zla ba dang nyi ma la brten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i rgyu

skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go/ /de la mdzub ni sor brgyad kyi tshad de/ mdzub de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub bcu gnyis par rig par bgyi'o/ /glad pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang / rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang ste/ mdzub bcu

bzhi ni skar ma rnams kyi gnas so/ /gang de dag na gda' ba ni rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la btsas pa de dang de dag na gda'o/ /yang gang zhe na/ de bshad par bgyi yis thub pa chen po gson cig /smin drug la ni su btsas

pa/ /de yi gdong gi sor bzhi na/ /g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis/ /spu can gnag la mdog kyang dmar/ /longs spyod bdog cing grags dang ldan/ /mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te/ /smin drug la ni skyes pa yi/ /

mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so/ /gang zhig la ni sor bzhi na/ /sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de/ /snar ma la ni skyes pa ste/ /shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'/ /mkhas la longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rnam pa kun du mdzes dang ldan/
dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs/ /dgra rnams rtag par rab tu 'joms/ /mgul pa yi ni mdzub phyed na/ /gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba/ /de ni mgo la skyes pa ste/ /dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o/ /

mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa la/ /g.yon na sme ba gang mchis pa/ /lag la skyes pa khro ba ste/ /de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog /mchan khung g.yon na sme nag mchis/ /nab so la ni skyes pa ste/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'byor

par 'gyur/ /de ni shes pa'i rgya yang chung / /ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes/ /mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'/ /phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni/ /nyi ma lta bur rab tu mdzes/ /dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang / /gyen

du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis/ /sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste/ /'dren pa khyed kyis nyon mongs thul/ /tshig 'dra gang gi snying ga mchis/ /skag la skyes te thab mo sred/ /tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs mi bde/ /

de ni g.yem la dga' ba'o/ /'og gam brang ngam rgyab cig na/ /gang la byi sran 'dra ba gda'/ /mchu la skyes te nor dang ldan/ /btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi/ /lte ba g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na/ /gang la rma 'dra gda' ba ni/ /

de ni gre la skyes pa ste/ /ser sna che zhing tshe yang thung / /lte ba man chad sor bzhi na/ /gang la sme ba rab gda' ba/ /spo la de skyes longs spyod can/ /khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris mchi/ /me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag /

sme ba dmar po chu sor gda'/ /rku zhing g.yo can sgyu ma ste/ /bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan/ /gang gi mtshan la sme ba ni/ /gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang / /nag pa la ni skyes pa ste/ /'dod chags glu gar dag tu dga'/ /

mtshan gyi 'og gam steng na ni/ /sme ba ser po rab tu gda'/ /sa ri la ni de skyes te/ /mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdang / /brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub gang na/ /sme ba dmar po de bzhin te/ /sa ga la ste shor ba mchog /skyes

pa bud med rnams kyis bskor/ /mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul/ /rtag tu bde la gnas pa ste/ /ngo tsha shes shing brten dang ldan/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye/ /brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub do na/ /gang la byi sran

'dra ba gda'/ /lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can/ /chos dang longs spyod ldan pa'o/ /gang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni/ /sme ba gda' ba snron la skyes/ /mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal/ /dbul zhing snying rje

ma mchis so/ /pus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni/ /gang la rma chung gda' ba de/ /snums la skyes te dbang thang can/ /myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid/ /chu stod la ni skyes pa dag /sme ba pus mo'i lha nga na/ /sbyin pa bgyid

cing chos lam 'tshal/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi/ /chu smad la ni su skyes pa/ /gru do la ni sme ba mchis/ /de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan/ /longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams/ /sme ba gnyis po gda'
ba ni/ /gro bzhin la ste longs spyod rtag /de bzhin nad med sems can byams/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi/ /sme ba nag po rje ngar la/ /gda' ba mon gru skyes pa ste/ /de ni khro zhing 'dod chags

chung / /longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan/ /rje ngar la ni mdzub do na/ /sme ba nag po rab tu gda'/ /mon gre la skyes blun po ste/ /de ni chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rje ngar 'og gi mdzub gang na/ /rma 'dra

mchis pa khrums stod la/ /blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid/ /de ni dbul zhing rkun po bgyid/ /gang la sme ba mdzub gang na/ /khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims dran pa dang / /shes rab 'jigs med snying rjer ldan/ /

gang gi rkang pa gnyi ga la/ /sme ba phra mo gda' ba ni/ /nam gru skyes pa ma rabs te/ /'dreg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags/ /gang gi mthe bo'i phrag na yang / /sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni/ /rtag tu stobs ldan nad ma mchis/ /tha skar la ni

de skyes so/ /rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni/ /bra nye la ste snying brtse med/ /gsod pa'i gshed ma'i ngang tshul can/ /shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi/ /gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba yi/ /skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags/ /'jig rten

na ni rnam shes 'dis/ /sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun du rtog pa'i spyod yul can/ /byis pa gang la chags 'dug pa/ /de ni byis pa rmongs pa ste/ /sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas/ /

khyi dang sbrul dang ru sbal dang / /srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po/ /skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa/ /de dag bde la sten ma yin/ /ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang / /thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin/ /nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na/ /

ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad ces gsol to/ /drang srong mi yi gzugs su ni/ /mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin du gda'/ /khyod kyi gdung

rus ma 'tshal na/ /lha 'am 'on te khyod mi lags/ /gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni/ /tshangs pa chen po bzhin du gda'/ /spyod pa'i gnas dang tshul gyis ni/ /sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang 'dra/ /thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs/ /'di sngon

ma mthong ma thos na/ /khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra/ /khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /pha rol tshu rol mi shes shing / /mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa/ /de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcing / /

de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin/ /pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus/ /bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan/ /yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing / /dbang po drug ni rnam par bshig /chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan/ /nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum/ /byang chub sems

ni nam skyes pa/ /de tshe nga ni rab tu byung / /mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs/ /mtshan ma med pa rab tu bsgoms/ /sems can med cing srog med pa/ /bdag med stong par mngon sangs rgyas/ /tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum/ /stong pa

nyid du rnam par bsgoms/ /nga ni ye shes pha rol song / /nga yi tshigs 'di gsungs pa med/ /gang dag mkha' bzhin ma chags par/ /byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa/ /de dag bzod stobs phun sum tshogs/ /ye shes 'di 'dra thob

par 'gyur/ /chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing / /rnam par smin pa 'dod med la/ /de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed/ /de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing / /pha rol tshu rol mi rten par/ /yang dag mthar

ni 'dir bsgoms na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med/ /dmigs pa de ni rnam par spangs/ /chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir

'ong la/ /rang gi sems la the tshom spongs/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su/ /nga 'dra sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog

dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur to/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi

rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las pa med de/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob po/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas/

bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /yon tan mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa/ /khyed kyi ye shes

spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad/ /rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa/ /sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/ /gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil

gyur pa'i/ /yon tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul/ /khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par gyur/ /tha ma'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i rgyu ni de ring mthar phyin to/ /sman pa chen po

sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa/ /sems can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol/ /bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mtsho bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi/ /ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba mi

yi dam pa lung bstan gsol/ /sdug bsngal chu bos bdas pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag /

de dag bdag gis dpang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi/ /drag cing mi bzad rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun/ /dus gsum gyi ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des/ /sems can

thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'das par shog /sems can thams cad nad zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skams par shog /ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes dbang po'i snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig /

sems can gang dag gsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams/ /de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar bar shog /sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig /shes rab bsod nams tshad

med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog /de dag sdig pa'i rnam spangs lta ba mnyam nyid myur du bsten gyur cig /sems can thams cad skye ba dran cing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog /sems can de kun chos grus srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal

gyur cig /thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog /bskal pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char pa 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig /sems can thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog /

bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dpang du gsol te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags/ /bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig /rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi

khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bar shog /bdag gi bsod nams cung zad ci mchis deng de byang chub bsngo bar bgyi/ /sems can ched du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi/ /sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam

du rab tu gzud par bgyi/ /bskal par zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang bar bgyi/ /gang du byang chub reg 'gyur zhing yang rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi/ /'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog /

smra ba'i seng ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shog /'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pa lung bstan gsol/ /'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo bsgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/ /me tog sil

ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhag pa kun kyang dpang gyis shig /sa rnams g.yo bar byed cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga'

bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i steng logs su gtor ba dang / me tog de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zing med cing

mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde bas tshim pa skyes par gyur te/ de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs so/ /drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis

la gtugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad

kyang yid skyo zhing bltad mor gyur to/ /gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur cing drang srong chen pos me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la gdugs su

gyur te gnas pa dang sa g.yos pa de yang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ /gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi

cha byad du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas zang zing med cing mchog

tu dga' ba dang / mgu ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan ji snyed pa dag gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs

su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon/ /byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsung / /mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing / /nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug /

khyod ni 'jig rten phan phyir ston dbang po/ /rkang gnyis bdag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su/ /bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha' tshad mnyam pa/ /khams gsum snying po 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni

bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na/ byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/

bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te/

khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur te/ khyod kyang de na theg pa chen

po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba lung bstan pa de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i las la

mngon par brtson par gyur to/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/

de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba thob bo/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
bam po lnga pa/ de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang

bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang dang gang nas gshegs pa de'i sgo de dang de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas brgyan to snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun

tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/ /grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis

grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so/ /bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bkod

pa'i mchog rnams dang / bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to/ /bdud bye ba de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la ni tshangs pa'i

cha byad lta bu nas drang srong chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang / rta babs dang / ba gam dang / skyed shing gi nang du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang /

gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan dang / dkrol ba sna tshogs ni dkrol

nas bstod pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba/ khyad par du 'phags pas rgyal po'i

khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na bzhugs te/ zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la reg ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod

sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa dang /

bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste/ sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad sa g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen

po kho ra khor yug tu bskor nas sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing me tog dang / spos dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang / phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs

kyi cha re re na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa rnams su sangs rgyas la mchod cing sti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba dang /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang / phye ma dang / rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag bltos/ /byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod/ /khyod kyi 'khor ba'i gcong rong 'khyams pa

yi/ /'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos/ /yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyis/ /g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thong la/ /'dir ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid la byos/ /byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par

'gyur/ /thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan med/ /'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshegs/ /bdud stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad des/ /de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor/ /grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro

dga' mdzad/ /dpa' mchog dngos po yang dag ston par mdzad/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas/ /byang chub tu ni de ring lung yang ston/ /rang byung mya ngan med pa grong khyer gshegs/ /de phyir zhing der

rab tu myur gshegs la/ /de ltar mdzes pa de dag rab bltos te/ /rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos/ /yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i tshal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang / nyan thos

chen po gang dag nang du yang dag par 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la gzhes shing bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi snams logs su 'khod pa dang / bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas me tog dang / phye ma'i rgyan de dag

las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to/ /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os

pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed par 'os pa 'di lta bu/ spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu'i yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dag dang / me tog dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag ga las 'ongs snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi rgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du

bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu dag snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing rdul bsags pa med ces bya ba yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra ba

dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtsig pa med la legs par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de rgyal po'i khab

kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na/ shin du lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs par snang ba ni ma gtogs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag sgra thos pa des bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir blta

zhing 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug par mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yang blta ba dang /

phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der 'dong ngo / /der ni bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi

rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te/ skad cig thang cig

yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to/ /de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhag nas/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i bar ma lus par gang bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs

pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par

byas so/ /la la dag gis ni mu tig gi char phab pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / rdo'-i snying po dang / spug dang / go shir sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi

snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni lhab lhub dang / phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo/ /

bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs bsgreng ngo / /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs so/ /

la la dag gis ni rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to/ /la la dag gis ni sil snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs dkrol to/ /la la dag gis ni glu dang gar dang / rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to/ /la la dag gis ni sa phyogs der spos chu sna

tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab bo/ /la la dag gis ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na thogs so/ /la la dag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos

chus bkang ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mas brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na thogs so/ /la la dag gis ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas

'phang stod de thogs so/ /la la dag gis ni bdag nyid tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'khod pa nas rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no/ /la la dag ni seng ge'i cha byad du

mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mig gi dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnams la

thags thogs med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs rnams dang / rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /

stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas srang gi dbus na pad ma yod pa ga

la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil gyis pad ma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so/ /pad ma de drangs te g.yos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang / ri khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab

dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang g.yos so/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad na gzhal med khang dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so/ /de na gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang / bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdud kyi

tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to/ /rgyu med rkyen med par ni gzhal med khang 'di dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang /

bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang / bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag go snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lnga can du gyur na/ 'di sus legs par brgyan cing shin tu

nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo/ /de nas rang gi yul la gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag de na 'khod bzhin du yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing shin du lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs

pa mthong ngo / /thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems can gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas sems can

gcig kyang ngo mi shes te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par mthong ngo / /de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bdag cag gi jo

bo dang / g.yog du bcas pa gar dong ba yang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags

nas spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rab tu rnam par dad sems kyis/ /bcom ldan bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bdag khrol 'di nas myur du thong / /chos

ni yang dag spyad par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba yang / /ngas ni su la'ang bzlog pa med/ /gal te lam ni rab shes na/ /gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos/ /bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rang gi spyod yul gar

dga' bar/ /gang tshe bdag ni mchi 'tshal te/ /bdag ni bcing ba lnga dag gis/ /bcings par mthong ngo gau ta ma/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni rtog pa kun spangs te/ /grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa/ /ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas/ /sems can bcings

pa thar bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dir lhags

pa dag thams cad kyang / /the tsom thams cad rab spongs la/ /skad cig ci yang ma smra bar/ /khyod cag rnams ni da nyon cig /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dkon chos dang dge 'dun shin du dkon/ dad cing mos pa 'byor pa dang / /byang chub spyod pa shin du dkon/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mngon

sum du/ /chos nyan pa yang shin du dkon/ /gang du bzod pa bsten byed pa/ /de yi dus ni rnyed par dka'/ /gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi/ /rtog pa thams cad rab spong ba/ /stong pa nyid ni bsgom pa dang / /sems ni dul bar byed pa dkon/ /ji ltar ngas ni sngon

spyad pa'i/ /byang chub spyod pa rnyed par dka'/ /de las me tog tsham tshod 'di/ /khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/ /gang gis byang chub 'byor byed pa/ /srid pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing / /mun pa'i phung po sel ba yi/ /lam gyi mchog ni bstan par bya/ /dri ma ngan

pa gsum spongs la/ /ston pas gsungs pa 'dir nyon cig /chu bo rnams kyi pha rol rgol/ /rgya mo can gyi sred pa spongs/ /rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing / /sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas/ /khams gsum kun gyi nyon mongs gang / /de dag ma

lus rnam par chom/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchod dang / /chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams/ /sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi/ /byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams/ /dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems/ /bye brag du ni rab tu

spongs/ /khams gsum pa las grol ba yi/ /zhi byed bzod pa thob par byos/ /phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis/ /so so'i skye bo bslad pa rnams/ /dngos po med la rtog byed pa/ /de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin/ /mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis/ /

lus dang ngag dang sems bsgribs nas/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams/ /'khor ba shin du bsten par 'gyur/ /'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal/ /bsam gtan sgom pa byed pa rnams/ /de dag phyin ci log bzhi las/ /de ring rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /dbang

phyug de dag sems can rnams/ /chu bo bzhi las thar bar byed/ /'chi 'pho skye ba rab shes pa/ /des pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dag /sems can sred pas bcings pa rnams/ /yang dag shes pas

gcod par byed/ /phung po lnga rnams yongs shes pas/ /zhags pa las grol zag pa med/ /yang dang yang du mi skye ste/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed/ /sdig pa dag ni myur du shogs/ /sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la/ /

'jigs pa med par pha rol song / /srid par yang dang yang skyes pas/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni/ /'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po rab spongs te/ /sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nas/ /

'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas te/ /dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig /btung ba'i dam pa 'thung bar byos/ /stong pa nyid kyang rab bsgoms shig /dam pa'i don la dngos po med/ /rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid med/ /'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste/ /

byed pa po ni 'di la med/ /de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang / /dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med/ /tshor ba drug dang sred pa drug /reg pa drug las byung ba yin/ /de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug /stong pa yin par shes par byos/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par/ /dngos po

nyid la brtag par byos/ /skye ba med cing 'gag med pas/ /'di na rdzas kyang med par bltos/ /gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste/ /dus gsum du yang dngos med par/ /shes pa de dag nad med de/ /de ni bla na med pa'i lam/ /rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la/ /sems

can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing / /tshu rol pha rol rnam grol ba/ /de ni bzod pa bsgom pa yin/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis dbyangs kyi

dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i snyigs ma lnga can gang gA'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi

tshig brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas/ /de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni shin du zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa rnyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /la la dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni don dang / tshig dang / yi ge 'di dag thos nas phyir

mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to/ /sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas pad ma'i khri la 'dzeg par

bya ba'i phyir rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi/ /

'dam du bying ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la/ /rab tu gzigs te mi rgyu rgyur bcas te/ /'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs/ /thal mo sbyar ba'i sems can rgya chen brgyas/ /rab tu bltam pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su/ /chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo

bar gsol/ /rang gi mthu rtsal rab tu bstan du gsol/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i pad ma mngon 'dzegs te/ /mgon po shes rab dang ni thabs rnams kyis/ /chos chu sprin gyis char pa rab phob la/ /nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol/

phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan/ /khyod kyi dpang du de dag kun bzhugs kyis/ /thub pa'i dpang po bdud rnams pham par mdzod/ /chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang / /ngo bo nyid kyis

ya ma brlar mkhyen nas/ /sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la/ /bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol/ /chu bo bzhi dbus 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /mi yi seng ge de ring bsgral du gsol/ /khyod kyis chos rnams shin du
