thugs su chud/ /srid gsum mtsho las 'jig rten bsgral du gsol/ /shin du rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das/ /bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la/ /'gro ba gzud 'dod mtshungs med chos kyang ston/ /'jig rten nyes pa

dri ma bsal du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sprul pa'i them skas de las pad ma'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te/ pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas

bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa/ bdud sdig can ji ltar khyod kyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang / rga shis gtses pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur

rnam par thar bar 'gyur ro/ chu bo bzhi las yang dag par rgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di la sdig can khyod ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam

par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyis khyod dga' bar gyis shig /sdig can khyod kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /de nas

bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /ci ste sdig med khyod la tha ba zhe sdang rgyags med na/ /ci phyir deng 'dir kun du skrag par bya phyir chos kyang ston/ /de ste khyod la tha ba rgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni/ /thub dbang khyod kyi thar pa ci

'dra bdag la 'dir shod cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni sa la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcur gnas pa/ /de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la bsad par rab tu sbyar/ /de tshe nga la khon dang tha ba cung zad tsam yang med/ /nga ni bzod dang

ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin/ /nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g.yo bar byas/ /nga gsad phyir ni rdo ba'i char pa rab tu dbab par byas/ /de nas khyod kyis nga yi ma yi nu zho myur skams byas/ /khyod kyis nga la gnod pa rnam pa du ma

ci ma byas/ /nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud med khrid de 'ongs/ /nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par spyod tshe zas kyang gcad par byas/ /khyod kyis rtag tu nga la rgyal srid mngon par rab tu bstabs/ /nga ni 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas

par gyur/ /de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong khyer kun du bskor/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song tshe rdzing char drag par rab tu phab/ /sa ni mdom do 'phang tsam rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas/ /zhi ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung / /

nga ni shin du dka' ba spyod tshe grang ba'i rlung dang ni/ /'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang / /nga ni gsad par bya phyir khyod kyis seng ge rab tu btang / /de tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas la drag po'i dug kyang btab/ /nga ni byang chub

shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba na/ /rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags spu gri mda' char khyod kyis phab/ /'gro la phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na/ /khyod kyis ngur smrig gos kyang 'jim rdzab dag gis rab tu bskus/ /de na yang ni nga gan

khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste/ /nga gsad phyin ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi/ /'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas cung zad med/ /ngas ni khyod btul nas su byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob/ /'on kyang ngo tsha bor

te 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang smra 'am/ /sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srung mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te/ /khyod kyis sems can bye ba du ma ma rung byas nas kyang / /snying rje bor te 'dir yang nga la rgal zhing sgyu byed dam/ /nga yis

zas ma zos pa de yi tshe yang khyod kyis su/ /nga bsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang / /sa steng nga la lhas sbyin gyis ni rdo ba 'phangs pa dang / /kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang / phyar ka gtang phyir bu mo mdzes

ldan rab tu gang btang dang / /me mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang / /kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi/ /de la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin/ /khyod nyid dpung bcas

bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su/ /nga bsad phyir ni mda' bo che dang ral gri mda' mang thogs/ /'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga yi spu gcig ma g.yos na/ /ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas da dung 'dug /ji snyed bdud ni stong phrag

bye ba rgol du yang btsud kyang / /sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ni 'dir yang lhags nas su/ /zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te/ /nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya/ /nga ni snying rje'i gnas

te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa/ /khyod ni shin tu gtum po nga la rtag tu bgegs byed de/ /thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga yi dbang yin gyi/ /da ltar tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya/ /rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams

kyi don yang spyad par bya/ /smras par gyur kyang bzod pa yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/ /nga la phrag dog tha ba rab tu khro ba'i yid med de/ /khyed ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson/ /nga la gsol dang khyod yid zhi phyir 'jig rten

gsum dag tu/ /mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshad par bya/ /de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyi/ /'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dad par byos/ /khyod ni rtag tu 'di na gnod pa bya bar rab

sems kyang / /khyod dgrol phyir ni nga snying rtag tu byams par rab tu dang / /sdig pa'i blo gros bor la dad bcas yid la byos shig dang / /ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang lung bstan to/ /de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la rab

tu 'khros te 'khrugs shing rngam nas de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / bdag gi mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te/ 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i phyir rang

'khros pa'i mthus shin du tsha ba'i dbugs btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho

la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin du yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag

gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/ me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga las mchis/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon

gyi smon lam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi

stobs byed pa/ dgra dang phas kyis rgol ba thams cad shin du tshar gcod par byed pa/ ngo mtshar dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mu ge dang / 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang /

'gyed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par grang zhing tsha ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / nad dang / sgra mi snyan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang /

mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par byed pa rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs pa/ rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa/ shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ lam drang por rab tu ston pa khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang /

grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin par dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo thams cad 'thun par byed pa/ lo tog dang /

me tog dang 'bras bu dang 'bru dang sman thams cad grub par byed pa/ bzo dang / las kyi mtha' dang / gnas dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/

rig pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / bzod pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis

rlob pa/ theg pa chen po ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sems can chen po rnams dbugs 'byin pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/ sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa/

mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa/ dbang bskur ba'i chos dang / byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa/ gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par

byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa/ bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi ros sems can rnams tshim par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/

bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar bar byed pa/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye

ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes

bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so/ /byin gyis brlabs so/ /gcig la gcig dgyes so/ /da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes

la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung ngo / /

byin gyis rlobaso/ /gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag

kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /gcig la gcig

dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis

sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa/ gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa/ 'di ltar yon tan

bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyid pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs

phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa/ bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa nas/ phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du

bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la

bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo / /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge

'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang lhan cig

sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / ngan par spyod pa las bzlog pa dang / bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying

pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i

gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye

ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang / chos de yang nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brgyan bkod pa de dag la blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma mthong ma thos pa blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang /

da nged lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na/ gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la yang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / chos nyan par rngo thog pa blta na de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig

tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan

pa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o/ /de dag las chos kyang mnyan

par bgyi'o/ /der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bkod pa bzhis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed legs par brgyan pa de yang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis

sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so na rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams der 'jug pa'i gnas dang / go skabs kyi phyir

de ltar the tshom ma za zhig /de ltar nem nur ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni mtha' yas so/ /

rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yangs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag yongs su brtag pa bzung ste sems can gang la la sems can gyi khams su bsdu bar bsdus pa khams

dang skye mched la gnas pa'i sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du gyur du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi

nang du chud par nus so/ /sems can re re zhing yang yul dang gnas kyi skabs yangs te/ sems can de dag phan tshun du mig rgyang gis kyang mi slebs so/ /yungs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba

dang gang bar yang mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang sra ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sa'i khams te/ de bzhin

gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la/ rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs

mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chud par nus la skra'i rtse mo de gcig tu chu'i

khams de thams cad bcug kyang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon no/ /rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni me'i khams te/ me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de thams

cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la me'i khams de thams cad rdul phra rab de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin du yangs te/ rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi

khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jug nus la/ rlung gi khams de thams cad ba spu'i khung bu de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te/ rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag gzhan

yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des ni gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang / lhan cig tu rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog par nus te/ rdul gcig la sems

can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyis mtha' rnams spyod kyang gnas shin du yangs par rgyu ste/ phan tshun gnod pa yang med la rdul gcig gi rtse mo de yang bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya

thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skye mched drug dang / spyod pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / smon lam dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / tshig gi lam gyi sgra dang / yi ge dang /

tshig brjod pa dang / 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang / phung po dang / dpyod pa dang / bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas bzung ste/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba

na srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du

gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod pa dang / kun tu spyod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa

shAkya thub pa des skad cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par dus gsum gyi mtha'

yongs su mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pas mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad med pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no/ /mtshan nyid bshad pa

'di lung bstan pa na phyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin par gyur to/ /'dus pa chen po rin

po che tog gi gzungs las/ mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // bam po drug pa/ yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis gshegs par chas nas/ skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi

pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

de dag kyang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khod do/ /de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed

kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong dang thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byon to/ /byon nas kyang pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so/ /yang de'i tshe na lho phyogs

logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs so/ /

yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o/ /'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs

pa'i bar du'o/ /steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba byon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing

gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs par chas pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams

su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang rang gi bsod

nams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pad ma'i gdan sprul pa rnams la 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni

'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char phab bo/ /gong du smos pa bzhin sbyar te/ la la dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor bar byas so/ /la la dag gis ni chos nyan pas bskor nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo

sbyar te 'khod do/ /la la dag gis ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so/ /yang de'i tshe na zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas

kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs/ /sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i/ /dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'di snang / /byang chub sems dpa'

brtul zhugs mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang bas/ /zhing 'di mchod rten gyur pa ste/ /zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas so/ /gang na sems can smad pa yi/ /zhing ni snyigs ma lnga ldan 'dir/ /thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par/ /

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng mi gshegs/ /de ring bdud ngan tshar gcad cing / /nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhom dang / /spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir/ /de yi don du kun nas gshegs/ /yid ni rab tu dang byos la/ /bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa yi/ /

chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos/ /theg pa chen po spyod pa'i lam/ /bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos/ /nyon mongs thams cad zad bya'i phyir/ /gzungs 'di de ring mnyan par byos/ /gdan rnams la ni

bzhugs nas ni/ /bsrung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir/ /de phyir thams cad mgrin gcig tu/ /'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig /dam chos yun ring gnas bya'i phyir/ /sgrib pa thams cad zhi byed pa/ /chos rnams thams cad bsdud pa

yi/ /gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pad

ma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te deng thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pas yongs su bsgoms pa mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bshad pa chos thams cad bsdud pa/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa/

bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol la chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa the tshom thams cad

gcod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad bsrung ba bla na med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang / blo gros dang /

rtogs pa dang / mos pa mi brjed pa dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun ston pa/ bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la 'jug

pa/ snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang / longs spyod dang / stobs dang / grags pa

dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang / dran pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang / dgra thams cad pham par bgyid pa dang / lo tog mngon par 'grub pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / dran pa'i snod du

'gyur ba dang / spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs 'di da 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang /

yun ring du gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chud mi 'dza' ba dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag bstan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' dang / de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang / snang ba dang /

dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba dang /

mi 'byung ba dang / mi 'gag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po ma mchis shing yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog

gsum mngon sum du gyur cig /sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan par bgyid par gyur cig /sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

sems bskyed pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang nas pad ma'i snying po

de dag la bzhugs so/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas ky-i zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i phyir dran pa dang / dad pa dang /

dang ba dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang /

zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can

so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi 'di na gzhan su yang med do/ /bdag gcig pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i

phyir chos ston par bzhed do/ /'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btab bo snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /

yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad bstan te thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cag

la chos bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin

gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin tu lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag pa rin po che dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /

ba dan dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas

kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas

te/ sems can bsam pa nyams pa/ lam rab tu stor ba/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/ ngan song gsum du bzhugs pa/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/

mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du snying brtse ba dang /

brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ngal ba dang / chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro bar bya'o/ /sems can

la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro med pa shin du smad pa/ mi mthun pa'i zas bza' bar bgyi'o/ /de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du sbom pa rtsub pa/ reg na mi bde ba/ sha na dang / shing bal dang / gso ma'i ras dang /

phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o/ /ri dang / ri sul dang / nags stug po dang / grong stong dang / dur khrod du gnas par bgyi ba nas rtsa'i mal cha dang / gso ma dang / shing gi 'dab ma dang / rtsub pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ reg na mi bde

ba'i mal cha spyad par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyi ste/ rgyal rigs rnams la ni/ rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi gtam

bgyi'o/ /bram ze rnams la ni rig byed dang / skar ma'i gtam dang / blon po rnams la ni yul dang las kyi mtha'i gtam dang / sman pa rnams la ni khams dang / sman dang / bsgrub pa'i gtam dang / tshong pa rnams la ni

nyo tshong gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa'i gtam dang / bud med rnams la ni kha dog dang / rgyan dang / bu dang / phyug pa dang / 'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang / dge sbyong rnams

la bzod pa dang / des pa dang / las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o/ /sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon du ma bgyis pa mngon du bgyi bar gzud do/ /ma thar ba rnams

rab tu thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o/ /sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yul thams cad du rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de na bdag la gshe'o/ /

mi snyan pa zer ro/ /phrag dog gi chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa 'debs so/ /kha gsag dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang / brdzun smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / bud med kyi

tshig dag gis skur pa 'debs so/ bdag la sas 'thor ro/ /bdag la gsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang / dug dang / me dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / mda' dang / ral gri dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / rdo dang /

mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so/ /bdag gsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / glang dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / phag rgod dang / tshan po che rnams kyang 'gyed do/ /bdag gi gnas dang /

gnas khang dang / gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang / dri nga bas 'gengs so/ /bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du bzhugs pa rnams la 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis glu dang gar tshul ma yin pa byed du

'dzud do/ /thabs brgya stong du mas bdag gsad pa'i phyir brtson no/ /bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul kyi sgron ma gsad pa dang / chos kyi gru bzhi pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang /

bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no/ /da sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag

gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi

rigs gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'thab

pa dang / brtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmags tshogs dang / 'ching ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rgol ba dang / dus ma yin par grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char pa dang / rlung dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes pa dang /

lta ba ngan pa ya nga ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor thams cad bsrung ba

dang / g.yo dang / dug dang / byad dang / rmongs byed dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bltas ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs dang /

bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje 'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzud pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brten pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol du

'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye

ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs te/ gcig la gcig dgyes pa des 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga

dang ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bsrung ba'i slad du chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa

lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas pa bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi yul kyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol du 'gro bar

bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse bar mdzad de/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phas kyis rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du

'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ byin gyis brlab du gsol/ bshad nas kyang phan tshun

rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lags kyang bgyi ste/ chos kyi tshul yun ring

du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa nas sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du byin kyis brlab cing chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms

pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyis gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad nyon cig /'di lta ste/ a~M ka ra/ oM ka ra/ b+ha~M ka ra/

pra b+ha~M ka ra/ b+ha ya mi ha/ mi tra ma b+ha se/ a khe a kha a~M ba re/ do me do mad te/ ke bad Te/ ke yu re/ sa ma ba ha ne/ sa man ta b+ha dre/ d+harme d+harme d+harma ke/ dza pha le/ mi tra a nu pha le/ pha la ba te/ ga Ne ga Ne ba ran te/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li ke /

dzam b+ha ba te/ Ta ka Te/ Ta ka ba rAn te/ hi rin te/ shi rin te/ bin du ba te/ go b+ha he/ dzu re mi tra/ dzu re dzu she/ a gre a ba me/ sa s+ya ta thA tA na/ hu lu hi le tsan dre/ sa ma d+hi/ me d+harma/ ku tsu ru/ mu tsu ru/ a tsid tra/ tsi li tsi li li/ tsa ba ha/

tsu lu tsu lu/ me tra ba ha/ ku lu ku lu/ sa ra sa ra/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma hA sa ra sa ra/ tu Tu tu Tu/ ma hA sat+ya hr-i da ya/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ d+hu ma pa ri ha re/ a b+ha ye/ ru tsi ne ka rak+She/ A ya ma stu/ bi ba ha ti ti la/ ma ma le/ pha shwa kha shi shi ra shi shi ra/ lo ka bi nA ya ka

badzre badzre d+ha re badzre ba te/ badzre ma te/ badzre da de/ tsakra badzre/ tsakre tsa ba te/ d+ha re d+ha re/ b+ha re b+ha re/ pU re Ta re/ hu hu re/ b+ha~M ga ba~M ba re/ sha ra sha tsa tsi li tsu ru pu re/ maN Da na la/ maN Da ne/ ga ga ra Ne/ mu tra te ne/ sarba mU ha ne/ d+hi d+hi ra ya ni/ ma khi sha ra la

ya ni r-i Sha ni dza ni d+he ba ba tsi/ tsaN Da la se me/ sarba sas+ya a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a tsi na d+yan tu ma hA nA~M/ ni ni pA la ri ta/ o tso gre/ bi tsi ni/ ba na ra ha/ bu bu re/ gu ru gu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ hi li hi li/ ha ra ha ra/ ka ka nA ta ba ha hi hi ta ma/ a yur ha na kaN Da dz+wa la/

b+ha se ga da ne/ a ta ha ni/ marga a b+hi ri ha ni/ pha la sa t+ye/ a ro Sha ba ti/ hi li hi li/ ya tha ba dza ya swa kra ya tha ba ra Na tsa hri da ya ba ha sa t+ya pa ri b+hA ba/ marga a b+hi ro ha Ne/ a tsa la bud d+hi da da pra tsa la pa tsa ya/ piN Da hri da ya/ tsan dra tsa ra ha/ a tsa le sho d+ha ni/

pra kri ni marge/ i li i li le pra b+he sa ra pra te sarba tra thA ta/ sat+ya a nu ga te/ a na ba ra Na bra te a la tha a~M gu re sha mi ni mi bra h+ma pa yo ha/ a hi ti/ a b+ha hi/ ni ba ra ya ba/ a tsi ra marga/ la na largu sa re/ tri ran na bang sha d+harma kA ya/ dza la ts+tshan dre/ sa mu dra ba ti/ ma hA da b+hU ta bya ya/

su mu dra be ga ba d+ha ra Ni/ mu dre Na/ mu khi mu dra/ su ra pra ti sam bi da ta/ sa mu dra/ a brta ni/ sa~M mo ha/ skar bid+yu ta ra se k+Shi ti/ mu dri to si/ ye ke tsid pra ti b+hi ba ha/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ ki Ta ka ba Ta/ she la pra tI t+ya hra da ya na mu dri tA d+ha ra Ni na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/

dA na ti la hu k+Sha sarba dri da ya/ mu tri to si dzu da du dza ba da ta/ dza kha ba ta/ su ma ti pa ti/ ma hA ad b+hU ta mu dri ta/ yi ge tsid/ Sha Da ya ta na ni shri ta b+hu ta/ i na mi ne sa tsa ne/ go Sha sa tsa ne/ mu tri tra/ Ar+ya a d+hiSh+ThA na b+ha ba thA na/ n+ya tha ma hA pu ma n+ye sa mu ts+tsha ya/ a ba tA ra

ma hA kA ru Na ya/ mu tri ta sarba sa~M myag pra ti bad tsi ra d+ha dra na dz+wa la tu d+harma ne/ tri sarbe mu ni b+hi Sha b+h+ra/ ma hA kA ru Na/ sa mA d+hi/ dz+nyA na la b+ha ba le/ na mai tri ta ga a b+hi bir+ya ba le na a d+hiSh+ThA ta/ sarba b+hU ta a pa tsa yA ya swAhA/

de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /zhes lan gsum smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /kye ma'o thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che 'o/ /

kye ma'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkon mchog gsum

gyi rigs kyi byin gyi brlabs ston pa/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi zhags pa kun gcod pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ chos kyi phyogs bsrung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon

ma thos pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rjogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / 'du byed dang / skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya ba nas

sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/ /

gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung sum bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs

nas thal mo sbyar te kun du rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thams cad dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor/ /

'di 'dra ba ni rnyed par dka'/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che/ /mkhas pa 'di ni rnyed par dka'/ /gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi/ /mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pa/ /phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang / /mchog tu
rnyed par dka' ba'o/ /bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang / /dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa/ /dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /sgrib pa thams cad
bsal ba'i phyir/ /bzod dang des pa rab 'phel ba/ /sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa/ /rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong / /'di na ngan byas zlog byed pa/ /lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa/ /byang chub sems
dpa' dbugs 'byin pa/ /byang chub lam yang rab ston pa/ /pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa/ /bzang por spyod pa rdzogs byed pa/ /thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams/ /'phel bar bya phyir
byin gyis brlabs/ /dkar po'i phyogs ni bsdud byed pa/ /gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /byang chub lam las mi g.yo ba/ /chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i/ /gzungs la yid gnyis
thams cad ni/ /bsal nas lhag par mos par byos/ /gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba/ /'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no/ /chos smra rnams ni bsrung ba dang / /nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir/ /
gzhan gyis mi thub pa yi gzungs/ /bdag gis da yang bshad par bya/ /sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang / /sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/ /su dag 'di la dad pa

'bul/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul byin gyis rlob bo/ /

rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos la me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu

bdug pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ras dang rgyan dang ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas shin tu brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su seng ge'i khri reg na 'jam pa la 'dug ste gzungs

'di yang dag par bshad na su yang de'i sems 'khrug pa 'am/ khams 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'khrug pa 'am/ yid 'khrug par mi byed do/ /de'i lus la su yang dbugs mi gtong ngo / /glad pa na bar byed mi nus so/ /mig na ba dang / lce na ba dang /

so na ba dang / rus pa na ba dang / mgul pa na ba dang / dpung pa na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / rgyu ma na ba dang / lto na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brla na ba dang / byin pa na bar byed sus kyang mi nus te/ de ni gnas med do/ /de'i skad 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /chos smra

ba de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa 'am/ skad 'gags par gyur na yang des gzungs 'di klags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur te/ las yongs su byang nas bde bar 'gyur ro/ /chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar 'gyur

ba de dag la yang su yang khams 'khrug pa 'am/ skad 'gags par byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang / khams 'khrug pa dang / skad 'gags pa de thams cad yongs

su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol gzungs 'di la dad pa stsal du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ kha shan te/ a sa mA ro be mai tre so ma ba te/ e hi na ba kun dza be/ na ba kun dza be/ mU la sho d+ha ne/ ba ha kha/ ba ha kha/ mA ra pha ta thA tA ba ri tshe da ba ha sa ba ha sa/

a mu la/ a tsa le/ tsa tsa le/ pra tsa la/ d+hi d+ha le/ e ka na ya sa pa ri tshe de/ tsaN Di Na bo ra sa tri ne/ kha ga su ra ti Ne/ b+hu tA ko Ti pa ri tshe de/ dza la kha/ dza la kha ba ye/ dza la nA ma kha sha kha ka ka kha ha ha ha ha hu hu hu spar Sha be da na ba ri tshe da na/ a ma mA nu ma ma khya ma ma sa mu

dra/ mu dra ba/ kha sa~M skar Na ma pa ri tshe da Na/ bo d+hi sa twa k+ShA ti bi ma ma hA bi ma b+hu tA ko Ti a ka sha shA sa pa ri tshe da swAhA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen

po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po de dag dang / sems can gzi

brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di slad du kye ma gzungs 'di ni stobs che ba drag shul dang ldan pa ste/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/
'jigs pa dang / nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed pa nas bsgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes chen po bsags pa/ bla na

med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad do/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /yang de'i tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ lha'i las 'das pa'i gos dang /
spud pa dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rgyan chen po mchog rnams kyis lus brgyan nas bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur te/ tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul

bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir dbyangs kyis go bar bgyi ba la der bdag la bgegs cung zad kyang mi 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig

brjod pa rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsrung ba bshad par bgyi ste/ ci nas slad ma'i

dus na bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor tam/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ de bzhin du rgyas par bgyi ste/

sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor tam/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i bu 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ mi 'am mi ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan

pa rnams la glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol ba'i dgra phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te/ tha na chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang 'tshe ba 'am/ gnod par bgyid dam/ 'jig par bgyid dam/ mdangs

'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs chen po gtong ngam/ tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na/ bdag gis bdud nas mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar de dag bzlogs pa dang / chad pas gcad pa dang / tshar gcad pa

dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par bgyi/ bri rtsal bar bgyi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor

gyi tshig brjod pa byin kyis brlab tu gsol/ /'di la su zhig bdag gi grogs su 'gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin ces bya ba 'dzam

bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi rgyan kyi 'od kyis lus brgyan nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go/ /de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag

med kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug shig /che zhe 'dir bag med par ma byed cig /bcom ldan 'das la ma 'tshe zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa rnams ni spros la dga'/ /de bzhin gshegs la spros mi mnga'/ /de dag skye 'jig mtshan nyid kyi/ /

'dus byas dag kyang ston pa mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang / yi ge dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa ste/ che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du gcig

pas de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mdzad de/ nam mkha' la ni 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid sgro btags pa med do/ /ji ltar 'du byed gsum la nam mkha' mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dod pa'i

yon tan la spro bar mi mdzad/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog /mi gnas/ mngon par mi zhen te/ de bzhin du srog la ma yin/ skye ba po la ma yin/ gso ba la ma yin/ skyes bu la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ phung po dang /

khams dang / skye mched rnams la yang spro bar mi mdzad/ mngon par mi zhen na/ che zhe khyod kyis ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spro bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang

po rtog rtogs te tshig smros shig /khyod la des mi sdug pa'i 'bras bur gyur ta re/ skyes bu dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /skyes bu

dam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par brgyan nas/ bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis 'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma brjod cig /de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i

dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod par gsol/ 'di skad smras pas bdag 'bras bu mi sdug pa thob par ma gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can

gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de slar ma bshags na/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te des ma

gshegs su zin na/ tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud med kyi dngos po yongs su blangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis

khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyi rlabs kyis khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas 'di skad

ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar mi

'gyur bar 'dir dad pa stsal du gsol/ gang slad ma'i dus na bdud nas/ mi dang mi lags pa'i bar gyis/ de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyid par dad pa stsal du gsol/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gis

sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang / mnas bsgag pa'i phyir/ dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas/ sgra des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so/ /yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis/ mgrin gcig tu

'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo/ /bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i dus na gzungs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/

chos smra ba dang / nyan pa de dag dang / nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams

kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul gyis skyes bu dam pa gsungs shig /de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ ga Na Sha Na De/ ha re tsaN De/ ma hA tsaN De/ tsa me/ ha tsa mye so mye/ s+tha me/ a ba ha/

bi ba hA/ a~M ga tsan+te tra/ kha kha mU la pa ri tshe de ya kha sha tsaN De/ pi shA tsa tsa De/ a brta ni/ sa ma brta ni sa~M ka ri Ni dzam b+ha ni/ stam b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ u tsa Ta ni ha ma hA/ ha ma hA/ ma hA a~M gu tsa ne/ kha ga sha ba/ a ma le/ a mu

la pa ri ba d+he/ a sa re kha ba swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' zhing / /mang po tshogs par mi spyod na/ /mig mi mthong zhing mgo yang 'gas/ /yan lag tha dad 'jig par 'gyur/ /'di lta ste/ a tsa tsa a ba ha/ tsa tsa tsu/ khra kha

sha tsa Ta Ta kha tsa tsA na/ kha ga tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa na tsa ha/ ma la tsa tsa tsa mu la tsa tsa ha mA mu la tsa tsa ha mU ha mu/ ba u ba ha swA hA/ de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad nas sha za'i dbang po'i bar gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces kyang smras

so/ /stobs chen stobs kyi shugs shin du 'joms pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad de/ phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'dis btab na de dag 'tsho bar ga la 'gyur/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang

phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'byung po gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa can/ snying rje med pa byas pa mi gzo ba/ sems can la 'tshe ba rnams sam/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba rnams sangs

rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs tshol du nye bar 'ong ba dang / btsun mo dam pa dang / bu dang bu mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / blon po dang / shor ba dang / dpung

dam pa dang / 'khor rnams dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / dge

slong dang / dge slong ma dang bsam gtan dang / kha ton la 'grus pa rnams dang / zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs tshol du 'ong zhing tha na sems kyi skad cig gcig la spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la 'tshe 'am/ gnod par byed dam/

'jigs par byed dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs gtong ngam/ sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na/ bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar lus dri nga ba de dag gi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /de dag gi mig kyang long bar 'gyur

ro/ /snying yang skams par 'gyur ro/ /sha bkra can du 'gyur/ lus rul cing dri nga ba dang / rdzu 'phrul yang yongs su bri bar 'gyur/ de dag sa gas par ltung bar 'gyur/ rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhir gtor bar 'gyur/ rdul gyis

kyang yog nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'thoms par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag sa la rgyu ba de dag ni sa'i khung bur 'jug par 'gyur te/ sa'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag chu na rgyu

ba'i 'byung po sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal rigs nas zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa'i dge slong gi bar la 'tshe 'am/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di

dag las 'da' na de dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas pa nas/ de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /yang yul gang du bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung

ba der bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o/ /der chos 'dod pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de

nas bskrad par bgyi'o/ /yul de na 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / nad thams cad slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /

bde ba dang / 'dum pa dang / lo legs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'thun pa rnams bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba rnams dang chos nyan pa rnams la nad ma mchis pa dang / grags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / sti stang chen po

nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /yang de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i nang du ni tshangs pa kun kyis bkur/ bdud kyi nang du ni bdud kun kyis bkur/

brgya byin gyi nang du ni brgya byin kun gyis bkur ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam thos kyi bu dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor bsrung dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i

dbang po'i nang du ni de dag kun gyis bkur ba/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa bud med kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lag pa gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la mig mi 'dzums par

bltas te/ gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa ci yang ma yin par bltas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye khyod mig mi 'dzums par

ci yang ma yin pa'i bar du nga la ci zhig blta/ ci 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang / ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang yod dam/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod do zhes bya ba'i ming

gi dngos po ni rkyen kyi mtshan nyid do/ /mtshan nyid kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed rnams nas 'gog pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ma mchis pas na de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs

na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te ma rig pa ma mchis na srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag ga las skye bar 'gyur/ ci nam mkha' las skye zhes bgyir ni nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi

bu de de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rdzas ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ rtog pa ma yin/ rnam par rtog pa ma yin/ grub pa ma yin/ brjod pa ma yin/

ci yang ma yin pa ga shas med pa/ dngos po thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yang dag pa'i mthas yongs su bcad pa'o/ /bri ba med pa dang / gang ba med pa'i

phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni pha rol dang tshu rol la reg pa med pa'o/ /cha shas med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni brjod du med pa'o/ /mi g.yo zhing rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang / dngos po dang /

mtshan nyid thams cad med pa'o/ /tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa/ kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yan lag rnams skyes so/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe

srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa

lags na/ de ci'i slad du ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs dang / pha rol gnon pas khyod 'di ltar bdag la 'tshe/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul 'joms/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren/ 'gro ba med pa dang /

'ong ba med pa dang / ci yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob tu 'dzud pa/ gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyis bslab pa la slob pa na de dag la nyon mongs pa skye ba'i spyod pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slad

du grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / dbang

phyug chen po rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma

lus pa 'di dag gang bar bgyis/ snying rje med pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag glad pa'i nad mi zad pas btab ste/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing / lus kyang rul la dri nga bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig

rnams bshad/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / sha za de dag thams cad kyis kyang mgrin

gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag kyang thos ma thag tu glad pa na bar gyur te/ lus kyang rul zhing dri nga bar gyur nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

sdig can khyod kyis 'das pa de dran par byos shig /nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ khyod kyis nga bsad pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu tshun cad kyi sa dang nam mkha' bdud kyi sdes bkang ste 'ongs pa nas/ da ltar bdud bye ba 'khor

dang bcas te nga bsad pa'i bar du bkye bas/ de bas na khyod yongs su gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / de bzhin du bdud gzhan rnams nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang /

sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa/ ci yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba'i 'khor ba'i chu kun bskam pa dang / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan

las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams bsogs kyis/ sdig can khyod da

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig /de ltar na khyod glad pa na ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba 'di las thar bar 'gyur te/ mthar kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu mngon du 'gyur/

bdud kyi yul las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe/ bdud drug khri bzhi stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / sdang ba'i
gnod sbyin nas lus srul po sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi na/ ji ltar bdag cag

sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de dag mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di yang thob par 'gyur/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /

gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du glad pa na bar gyur kyang / bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo sgyus byang chub tu sems mi bskyed do/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag kyang sangs rgyas

kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bstan pa'i chos kun gzung bar spro'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bos gtad pa gzung bar

bgyi ste/ da yang shAkya thub pa'i nyi ma nub kyi bar du bdag gis bstan pa 'di la chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o/ /yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba der bdag gis 'byung bar

bgyi'o/ /gang du byung ba der ni shin du lhag par 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul de dag na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang

bar bgyi/ gnod pa las bzlog par bgyi/ don dang dge ba la gzud par bgyi'o/ /gang dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na bris nas/ 'chang ba rnams dang / gang na chos smra ba'i seng ge'i

khri la mchis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshal ba/ de dag gis der thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bgyi'o/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag 'gug par 'gyur te/

bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs der mchis nas/ chos smra ba de dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag bsrung ba dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ a ba me/ a ba me/ a ma ba re/ a ma ba re/ pa ri kuny+dza/ nA Da nA Da

puSh+ka ra ma hA/ dza lu kha/ ma kha ya/ i li mi li/ ki li mi li kArti tsa ra mu dre/ mu dra dra mu khe swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis/ thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis la/

bdag gis kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shin du yongs su dag pas thos te der ma mchis na/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bslus par 'gyur zhing / bdag bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis la chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba de'i spobs pa rigs pas nye bar bsgrub par

bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba dang chos nyan pa de dag gi nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ lta ba ngan pa dang bya ba ngan pa dang / the tsom thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang /

kun chub par bgyid pa der bdag 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / tsha ba dang /

lta ba ngan pa dang bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / dur khrod rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / brlang ba dang /

zhe gcod pa dang / ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / dri nga ba dang / reg na mi bde ba'i dug de dag thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /der tsha ba dang mu ge'i gnod pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o/ /glang po che dang / seng ge

dang / stag dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / rkun po dang / g.yon can dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /der sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang / kun

spyod pa'i slad du nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro dang zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / mal cha sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin

pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chad pa der bdag cag gis sems can rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa'i slad du phan pa

dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /sems can de dag kyang chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa la gzud par bgyi ste/ 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar smon lam

btab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ skyes bu'i mthu 'di nyams 'og tu chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la yid bzhin du bsam pa

yongs su rdzogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas de'i tshe de'i mod la shAkya thub pa la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa de la thugs brtse bar dgongs te 'di skad ces bka'

stsal to/ /tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dis gang gi phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

dri za dang / lha ma yin rnams bkug ste/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed par 'gyur gyis/ nged kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di la sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag

thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la grub par gyur cig /'di lta ste/ tsa muN De/ muN Da pa ri tshe de/ ha mU ha/ ha mU ha/ sa~M rak+Sha ba la/ krISh+Na mi kha/ pa ri ba ha/ tsa ma ra ya tha tsa/

su bi kha/ a mu hu la pa ri tshe de/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu bdud dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / gzhan yang

lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams 'gug cing 'dun par byed pa'i gzungs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis

yongs su bzung zhing / byin gyis brlabs kyis khyod 'di skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /dbyangs dang ldan pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bud med kyi cha byad 'di lta bus chos bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /

bud med rnams kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bud med la la zhig bu 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ bris te 'chang na bdag gis bud med de'i

bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /yang bud med gang 'di lta bus sems yongs su skyong bar gyur te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang zhing klog pa nas nyan pa'i bar du bgyid na/ de 'dod pa na spyod kyang de mngal du mi chags

so/ /yang bud med gang brnyas shing smad par gyur pa'i longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang bral ba des/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klags na bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing / bde ba thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur

ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la dbul lo/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ bsrung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //

bam po bdun pa/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin du rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig
na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 'od 'bar ba dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / skad cig gis bdud kyi gzugs su snang ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/
brgya byin gyi gzugs dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dbang po'i gzugs dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / 'thab bral dang / rgyal chen bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod

sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang /

dmangs rigs dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo / /skad cig gis bya dang / shing dang / ri dang / 'bras bu dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / snam bu

dang / snod dang / phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan dang / sman rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i gzugs dang / yud tsam gyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i gzugs dang / skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su snang ngo / /skad cig

gis kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs brgyad bcu rtsa bzhir snang ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di kha

dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs brgyad bcu rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu mthu che ste/

byang chub sems dpa' shin du rnam par phye ba'i blo gros dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul gang la gnas nas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / shes rab kyi mig sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi

zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bsam pa dang / sems pa ji lta bu dang / spyod pa ji lta bu dang / ci 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang / gang la gang skyabs su song ba'i sems can ji 'dra ba dag mthong ba

de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems

can rnams theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil kyis non te yo byad dang longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'dod pa de dag gi chags pa spang ba'i phyir yo byad rnams byin nas phyir mi ldog pa la 'god

pa dang / nad kyis btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la sman sbyin te/ phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis nyin gcig la gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal las

yongs su thar bar byas te/ theg pa gsum la phyir mi ldog par 'god pa'i dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin/ bgrod pa ma yin no/ /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

rigs kyi bu 'dis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes bu chen po'i mthu chen po brtsams nas ci srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi pha rol

du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni grangs med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskal pa gang dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi

mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams nas bskal pa grangs med pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'das so/ /gang pos gsol pa/ 'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag nyi shu rtsa drug 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po sgrol ba zhes bya ba la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/

skye dgu'i tshe lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na mtshams med pa byed pa nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /des lo bzhi khrir sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir

theg pa gsum po dag la sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa

'dis sngon sems can gang dag yongs su smin par bgyis pa de dag gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam ris su chad pa med de/ des smon lam 'di skad du/ nam phyogs bcu'i

phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad med par mthong bar ma gyur tam/ bdag gis sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems

can gang dag thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i

phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang gzhan dag na yang / sems can gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa dang / the tshom can nas mi

dge ba'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par gyur pa de rnams de dag nas shi 'phos nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes la/ bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du/ de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya ste/ phyir mi

ldog pa la so sor bkod nas/ de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu rgyun du bya'o/ /zhes smon lam btab bo/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa rnams ston pa 'di lta bu dag kyang mnyes par bgyis/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan

pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu yang mthong / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i/ chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /

tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi/ byin kyi rlabs sngon ma thos pa 'di yang mnyan pa'i slad du/ rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis legs par rnyed do/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ dam pa'i chos yongs
